issue.title: www.trueachievements.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.trueachievements.com/a232409/brutal-brexit-achievement](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.trueachievements.com%2Fa232409%2Fbrutal-brexit-achievement) ### Comment > In Edge, go to https://www.trueachievements.com/a232409/brutal-brexit-achievement and you will get a popup telling you to disable your ad blocker. This does not happen in Fennec (Firefox from F-Droid) or Chrome, only Edge. Username: `@nl255` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1tbvdout78ys0k48k8kcco4wskwcoccohiwkbn8q1w.jpg?nc=1)
